title: Here is a curated list of 20 articles up to 2022 that focus on self-supervised representation learning or model pre-training in the context of speech processing
note: as well as tasks that enable such self-supervised learning:

title: Unsupervised Pre-training for Speech Recognition"**
Authors: Alexei Baevski, Sergey Edunov, Yinhan Liu
Summary: Introduces wav2vec, a framework for unsupervised pre-training of speech recognition models
**"wav2vec 2.0: A Framework for Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations"**
Authors: Alexei Baevski, Yuhao Zhou
Summary: Presents wav2vec 2.0, which improves upon the original by learning contextualized speech representations
**"Learning Robust and Multilingual Speech Representations"**
Authors: Alexis Conneau, Alexei Baevski, Ronan Collobert
Summary: Discusses the application of self-supervised learning to multilingual speech data
Self-Supervised Learning of Transformer Encoder Representation for Speech"**

container-title: Conference: IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing 2021

title: Summary: Introduces TERA, a transformer-based model for self-supervised learning of speech representations
**"Mockingjay: Unsupervised Speech Representation Learning with Deep Bidirectional Transformer Encoders"**
Authors: Andy T
Summary: Proposes Mockingjay, a model using bidirectional transformers for unsupervised speech representation learning
Improving Speaker and Speech Recognition with Self-Supervised Learning"**
Summary: Enhances the PASE model for self-supervised learning in speech tasks
Self-Supervised Speech Representation Learning by Masked Prediction of Hidden Units"**
Authors: Wei-Ning Hsu

container-title: Conference: IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing 2021

title: Summary: Introduces HuBERT, a model that learns speech representations by predicting masked hidden units
**"Data2vec: A General Framework for Self-Supervised Learning in Speech, Vision, and Language"**
Authors: Alexei Baevski, William Chan
publisher: Daniel Park, Yu Zhang, Michael Auli

title: Summary: Proposes a unified framework for self-supervised learning across different modalities, including speech
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Speech Recognition: A Survey"**
Authors: Yao-Fei Cheng, Chia-Hsiang Chen
Summary: Provides a comprehensive survey of self-supervised learning techniques in speech recognition
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations Using Convolutional Neural Networks"**
Authors: Steffen Schneider, Alexei Baevski, Ronan Collobert

container-title: Conference: IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing 2020

title: Summary: Explores the use of CNNs for self-supervised learning of speech representations
**"Contrastive Predictive Coding for Speech Representation Learning"**
Authors: Aaron van den Oord, Yazhe Li, Oriol Vinyals
Summary: Introduces CPC, a method for learning speech representations via contrastive learning
**"Learning Disentangled Representations of Texts with Pre-trained Language Models"**
Authors: Yao-Hung Hubert Tsai, Shaojie Bai, Paul Pu Liang, et al
Summary: Discusses disentangled representation learning for text and its implications for speech
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Audio Representations from Permutations"**
Authors: Rainer Kelz, Gerhard Widmer
Summary: Proposes a permutation-based self-supervised learning method for audio representations
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations Using Global and Local Predictive Coding"**
Authors: Wei-Ning Hsu, Ann Lee, Gabriel Synnaeve, et al
Summary: Combines global and local predictive coding for self-supervised learning of speech representations
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Speech Enhancement"**
Authors: Yossi Adi, Eugene Kharitonov, Wei-Ning Hsu, et al
Summary: Explores self-supervised learning techniques for speech enhancement tasks
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Robust Speech Recognition"**
Authors: Anurag Kumar, Bhiksha Raj
Summary: Investigates the robustness of self-supervised learning methods in speech recognition
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Speech Emotion Recognition"**
Authors: Yao-Hung Hubert Tsai, Paul Pu Liang, Amir Zadeh, et al
Summary: Applies self-supervised learning to the task of speech emotion recognition
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Speech Denoising"**
Authors: Santiago Pascual, Joan Serr√†, Antonio Bonafonte, et al
Summary: Proposes a self-supervised learning approach for speech denoising
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations Using Variational Autoencoders"**
Authors: Wei-Ning Hsu, Yu Zhang, James Glass
Summary: Uses variational autoencoders for self-supervised learning of speech representations
**"Self-Supervised Learning for Speaker Verification"**
Authors: Jiatong Shi, Chao Weng, Dong Yu
Summary: Explores self-supervised learning techniques for speaker verification tasks
